movie001.title: Inception
movie001.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movie002.title: Interstellar
movie002.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movie003.title: The Matrix
movie003.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movie004.title: Fight Club
movie004.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movie005.title: The Dark Knight
movie005.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.

movie006.title: Pulp Fiction
movie006.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movie007.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movie007.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movie08.title: Avatar
movie08.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
